resources.string: Chennai also known as Madras is the capital of the Indian state of Tamilnadu. Located on the Coromandel Coast off the Bay of Bengal, it is a primary cultural, economic and educational centre of South India. According to the 2011 Indian census, it is the sixth-most populous city and fourth-most populous urban agglomeration in India.

Chennai also known as Madras is the capital of the Indian state of Tamilnadu. Located on the Coromandel Coast off the Bay of Bengal, it is a primary cultural, economic and educational centre of South India. According to the 2011 Indian census, it is the sixth-most populous city and fourth-most populous urban agglomeration in India.
